title: Bug 102623 - Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed and the new image is not shown.
EB: When importing a new image into the layout, the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
1. Open the layout.
2. Import a new image, for example, 'image1.jpg'.
3. Check if the new image is displayed instead of the original image.
